title: British Tennis Stars Win Big Together
summary: Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool are two British tennis players who had an amazing year in 2025. They won the Wimbledon men's doubles title and became the world's number one team. Even though they are great partners on the court, they have different plans for celebrating. Glasspool will have a fancy dinner in London, but Cash will be on a holiday in Tenerife with friends. Their friendship helps them play well together. Britain is now very strong in men's doubles tennis, with five British players in the top ten. All of them reached the semi-finals of a big tournament, and they often train together, which makes them successful as a group.
